system.description: The table may want vampires or demons to burst into flame in sunlight but if they also want some daylight confrontations then making it a Deterrent nods to lore without forcing most of the action into darkness; unless that fits the tone of the game. Control will say if this is a matter of radiation, so that ultra-violet light can bring the sun indoors, or if it is the mystical effect of the literal light of day that the threat fears.
